definition: To present or perform a creative work, such as a play, musical composition, or artistic production, in its initial or premiere showing. This term is commonly used in the context of theater, music, or other forms of performing arts.

examples.english: They will perform the play for the first time.

examples.german: Das Theater wird das neue Stück uraufführen.
examples.english: The theater will premiere the new play.
The ballet will have its premiere tomorrow.
